channel.title: Domain of the Infinite - Sci-Fi Graphic Novels and Comic Books
channel.itunes:author: Travis Rogers
channel.description: Domain of the Infinite is a video podcast that creates original sc-fi comic books and graphic novels. Download sci-fi comic videos files. The current sci-fi story is called Mind's Eye of Jupiter. An Historian studying an ancient Roman Temple learns of a legend called the Mind's Eye of Jupiter, A rip in the fabric of time that appeared for short time in the history of ancient Rome. Visit domainoftheinfinite.com to get more info about this and other sci-fi comic books.

item.description: The image of the Roman Emperor fades as the dream ends. The Platform detaches and falls from the Central Array. Alice exits the Dream Room and enters the Hangar. item.title: Mind's Eye of Jupiter: 05 - Sci-Fi Comic Book
item.itunes:author: Travis Rogers
item.description: The Platform moves past the Alcove exit and enters the darkness of the Dream Room. It speeds toward the center of the room. The Platform slows as it moves toward the dock of the Central Array. With a large metal bang, the array starts to rotate toward the Platform. Visit domainoftheinfinite.com for more information about this sci-fi story and buy prints and posters from this video series.

item.title: Mind's Eye of Jupiter: 01 - Sci-Fi Comic Book
item.itunes:author: Travis Rogers
item.description: Alice Renee Walks up the steps of the ruined Roman Temple. At the top of the stairs, Alice launches her holographic computer. The computer scans for anything that might help her prove the legend of the Mind's Eye of Jupiter. item.title: 3rd Brother: 11 - Sci-Fi Comic Book
item.itunes:author: Travis Rogers
item.description: From: 3rd Brother Graphic Novel - Avid's Castle is a massive building hidden deep inside a cave. He once formed this castle from a large rock formation hanging from the cave's ceiling. Lathon and Vin Lair enter the Castle for the final confrontation with Avid. Visit domainoftheinfinite.com for more information about this sci-fi story and buy prints and posters from this video series.

item.description: From: 3rd Brother Graphic Novel - Lathon guides Vin Lair to the Abandoned Structure. Inside they find glass columns that rise high above the floor. item.title: 3rd Brother: 09 - Sci-Fi Comic Book
item.itunes:author: Travis Rogers
item.description: From: 3rd Brother Graphic Novel - The Dark Forest is the same place where the Masked Leader saw the Dark Sword crashing from the sky. The impact changed the forest. The Dark Sword froze this place in time. The Dark Forest is trapped in a never ending state of night. item.title: 3rd Brother: 08 - Sci-Fi Comic Book
item.itunes:author: Travis Rogers
item.description: From: 3rd Brother Graphic Novel - Vin Lair makes his way to the Monolith statue of Avalon. The statue is the marker for Avid's youngest brother's tomb. item.itunes:author: Travis Rogers
item.description: From: 3rd Brother Graphic Novel - Van Lair is a Townsperson that took a stand against Avid. He was able to track Avid to the Northern Forest. He finds Avid and corners him in an old concrete building. Visit domainoftheinfinite.com for more information about this sci-fi story.

item.description: From: 3rd Brother Graphic Novel - The ancient knowledge that Avid seeks was created by the mysterious Masked Leader. item.title: 3rd Brother: 01 - Sci-Fi Comic Book
item.itunes:author: Travis Rogers
item.description: From: 3rd Brother Graphic Novel - After uncovering an ancient knowledge, Avid becomes obsessed with discovering the mysteries of time. This ancient knowledge speaks of a way to gain immortality by entering a void between the moments of time. Avid begins to experiment on the surrounding Townspeople and his own brothers. Visit domainoftheinfinite.com for more information about this sci-fi art and story.
